title: भाजपा का आरोप कि महुआ मोइत्रा ने आचार संहिता का उल्लंघन किया, क्या है सच?
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Seen here campaigning alongwith TMC MP Mahua Moitra is Thanapara P.S. OC Sumit kr. Ghosh who is regularly seen going for door to door campaign for the upcoming Karimpur by-election. Has Bengal police become a TMC stooge? @narendramodi@AmitShahpic.twitter.com/vnSd5ssVhC
